properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 b1 v2 b1 v3 b1 v4 b1

verse.name: c1a
c1b
verse.lines:
Just like a tree that’s
planted by the waters,
Lord, I shall not be moved.

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Just like a tree that’s
planted by the waters,
Lord, I shall not be moved

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus is my Saviour,
I shall not be moved;
In His love and favor,
I shall not be moved,

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In my Christ abiding,
I shall not be moved;
In His love I’m hiding,
I shall not be moved,

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
If I trust Him ever,
I shall not be moved;
He will fail me never,
I shall not be moved,

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
On His word I’m feeding,
I shall not be moved;
He’s the One that’s leading,
I shall not be moved,
